game.title: Clash Cup Turbo
game.description: Clash Cup Turbo is a colorful 2-4 player local multiplayer sports game, focused on crazy fun competition with friends and family. Smack the puck into the opponent's goal in a variety of stylized levels filled with obstacles and traps.
game.history: Clash Cup Turbo was by classic local multiplayer games that were deep and satisfying, yet simple and accessible. Our art director Mike pitched the idea to the team, focusing on 4-player local multiplayer, accessible 1-button controls, and a unique art style, and we couldn't resist trying it out. We jammed on the game for about 10 days, just in time to show off a 1v1 version at VGU Con in DC, and it was a big hit. Ever since then, we've been expanding the game with more levels, special moves, modes, and constant playtesting to make the most satisfying, beautiful, and accessible game we can.

features.feature: Playable with 360 controllers, DualShock 4s, and any other standard USB controller, as well as keyboard.
6 different level themes, based on stylized real-world locations, each featuring level-specific mechanics.
Unique level designs for 2, 3, and 4 players. Every level is hand-crafted to be fun for everyonE!
Skill-based gameplay with pick-up-and-play accessible 2-button controls, but a high skill ceiling.
10 different characters with varied special moves to enhance the already crazy core gameplay.
